headline.print_headline: NY Bank Regulator Lawsky Seeks Documents From Credit Suisse-Source
headline.main: NY Bank Regulator Lawsky Seeks Documents From Credit Suisse-Source

lead_paragraph: Benjamin Lawsky, New York's financial services superintendent, has sought documents from Credit Suisse to examine whether Switzerland's second-biggest bank lied to New York authorities about engineering tax shelters, said a source familiar with the matter.
